text: Malayathippennu is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KS Gopalakrishnan, starring Premlal and Disco Shanti in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Pattom Sadan * Premlal * Adoor Narendran * Aysha * Disco Shanti * Kavitha * Madhu Attukal * Poojappura Ravi * Rajendra Kumar * Saleena * Sankarjith * Babloo Prithiveeraj ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Malayathippennu
